definition[0]: to repeat a word or phrase again and again
definition[1]: to sing or say a religious song or prayer in a way that involves using only one note or tone
definition[2]: words or phrases that are repeated again and again by a group of people
example[2]: Others in the crowd took up the chant  (=began chanting).
example[3]: chants of ‘oh no, we won’t go’
definition[3]: a regularly repeated tune, often with many words sung on one note, especially used for religious prayers
